title: test_product_catalog_filters_and_search
description: Verify that the product catalog API endpoint returns filtered and searched product results correctly and within 1 second for a medium dataset.

title: test_product_comparison_functionality
description: Ensure the product comparison API endpoint allows adding and removing products without breaking the layout, especially on mobile devices.

title: test_cart_modification_and_removal
description: Test the cart API endpoint to confirm individual item removal does not affect other items and quantity adjustments work as expected.

title: test_order_pdf_generation_and_email_sending
description: Validate that the order PDF generation API creates PDFs with the observations block styled with green background, rounded borders, and correct padding, and that the email sending API sends the PDF as an attachment.

title: test_user_authentication_and_profile_management
description: Check the authentication API endpoints for login, user registration, and company registration to ensure server-side validation and secure data handling.

title: test_multilanguage_support_and_i18n
description: Verify that the internationalization API endpoints correctly serve translations in multiple languages using JSON locale files.

title: test_cnpj_company_lookup_integration
description: Test the API endpoint for company lookup by CNPJ to ensure it returns accurate company data based on the provided CNPJ.

title: test_product_api_queries_and_schema
description: Validate the product API endpoints for product queries, distinct values, and facet counts to ensure correct data retrieval and schema adherence.

title: test_ui_effects_and_visual_components
description: Ensure that the API endpoints supporting UI components with neon, shimmer, and ripple effects function correctly and deliver expected data for visual rendering.

title: test_database_scripts_and_data_integrity
description: Verify that the database scripts for products, companies, favorites, and users execute correctly and maintain data integrity for the API endpoints.
